The **CMS Program Statistics** (CPS) includes high-level summary reports focused on Medicare populations, use, and payment, as well as counts for Medicare-certified institutional and non-institutional providers.

1.  [Medicare Deaths](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/medicare_statistics/deaths.html)
2.  [Original Medicare & Medicare Advantage Enrollment](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/medicare_statistics/enrollment.html)
3.  [Medicare Parts A & B Enrollment](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/medicare_statistics/partsab.html)
4.  [Time Series](https://andrewallenbruce.github.io/medicare_statistics/timeseries.html)
